body:
Techselector is a free to use website that provides recommendations based on your answers to our carefully created questions.

You can use it to find laptops, cameras or phones and use it how ever many times you want, or free!!!
Our website is free to use and is supported via non-intrusive ads.

Currently access is limited to pc and laptop. Only desktop site is available.

 There are currently no plans or updates regarding access via mobiles.
You just need to answer our carefully crafted easily understandable questions regarding your needs.
We currently provide recommendations for cameras, smartphones and laptops.
